Current Topics

  1. April is Safe Digging Month

    If you are planning on digging, please call 811 to have services located. The call and the service is free and can help keep you and your community safe! Read on...

  2. Change of Polling Location for Precinct 204 Greenbrook South

    The polling location for the Greenbrook South precinct has changed. Please read on for more details. Read on...

  3. 2019 Spring CleanUp April 6 - April 14

    The Board of Supervisors, Mayors of DeSoto County Municipalities, & Keep DeSoto County Beautiful Committee invite you to join us for the 2019 Spring CleanUp! Follow the link below to watch a video from the Board of Supervisors and to sign up your team! Read on...

  4. Political Signs in Unincorporated Desoto Co.

    PLEASE READ for very important information regarding political signs!!! Read on...

  5. List of Candidates For State and County Offices

    Candidate List

  6. Used Flag Receptacles

    Used flag receptacles have been installed at two DeSoto County locations (one at the Admin. Building in Hernando and one at the Drivers License building in Olive Branch) for individuals to dispose of tattered US Flags. Flag Receptacles

  7. FY2019 Budget Report from the County Administrator

    Be informed and know the facts! This is a report of the FY19 Budget that the Board of Supervisors passed. Year 15 with no millage increase! Click the link to see the report. Additional Info...
